title: The Development Plan reservations included in the ITP area may be developed as per the provisions of Accomodation Reservations (AR) i
clause_text: The Development Plan reservations included in the ITP area may be developed as per the provisions of Accomodation Reservations (AR) i.e. Regulation No.11 of UDCPR subject to following conditions :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
